titles: The historie of Great Britannie declaring the successe of times and affaires in that iland, from the Romans first entrance, vntill the raigne of Egbert, the West-Saxon prince; who reduced the severall principalities of the Saxons and English, into a monarchie, and changed the name of Britannie into England.
author: Clapham, John, b. 1566.
Salteren, George, attributed name.
notes: Sometimes also attributed to George Saltern.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
The first part was published in 1602 as: The historie of England.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Roman period, 55 B.C.-449 A.D.
Great Britain --  History --  Anglo Saxon period, 449-1066.
